seasons.overview: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the time before he established his strip-mall law office in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

seasons.director: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Michelle MacLaren, Thomas Schnauz
seasons.Producers: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Mark Johnson, Melissa Bernstein
seasons.Staring: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks
